title: Spatial planning of the circular economy in uncertain times: Focusing on the changing relation between port, city, and hinterland
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Maritime Transport Research, Volume 7

Author(s): Karel Van den Berghe, Tanya Tsui, Merten Nefs, Giorgos Iliopoulos, Chrysanthi Papadimitriou, Tom Fitzgerald, Thomas Bonte, Aryzo Arrindell
